root.name: One Piece
root.description: This game is based on the anime One Piece. Throughout the game you will control Luffy and follow the beggining of the manga. There are a total of 15 characters from the manga, the original five members of the crew (Luffy, Zoro, Nami, Ussop and Sanji) although you only get to play as Luffy, and 12 villains like Buggy and Smoker.
